ygData.subject: Re: I have the answers.
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks, I will check again... It s also good to know that everyone has to spend that kind of money to be successful at it... Makes us all feel like it s not so
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks, I will check again... It's also good to know that everyone has to
spend that kind of money to be successful at it... Makes us all feel like
it's not so bad...

It's a shame that a skill which USED to be one of the most inexpensive to
set up (in Real life) is sooo expensive in the game. But, at least we don't
have to buy a forge and lug it around! hehe...

Lemac Justerian - High Elf Cleric

> From: "Reedo" <reedo@...>
>
> I just double checked and she does sell scalers. They are the very last
> mold on the left of her list. I
> 'm on Cazic-Thule but I would assume that they are all the same. As far
as
> spending hundreds of Platinum. Yes, expect to spend hundreds before you
> make any banded regularly. I'd spend at least 200PP before I could make
it
> regularly. I only have an INT of 75 so that slowed me down, but I have a
> very high success rate so it counterbalances. At 50 I was making skewers
30
> or 40% of the time. Don't worry. After you are good at banded that first
> couple of hundred you put into it won't seem like any big deal. That just
a
> few hours good work now.
>
> Arden
> Cazic-Thule
>
>
